title: Lowest Methane Emissions from Transport
description: In 2023, Dominica recorded the lowest methane emissions from transport, with a value of just 0.0001 Mt CO2e, highlighting its minimal contribution to global methane emissions from this sector.

title: Minimal Carbon Dioxide Emissions from Waste
description: Dominica achieved the lowest carbon dioxide emissions from waste in 2023, with a value of 0.0001 Mt CO2e, reflecting its effective waste management practices.

title: Low Nitrous Oxide Emissions from Transport
description: In 2023, Dominica reported one of the lowest nitrous oxide emissions from transport, with a value of 0.0003 Mt CO2e, indicating its commitment to reducing greenhouse gases.

title: Negative Net National Savings
description: In 2018, Dominica had a net national savings rate of -25.3% of GNI, indicating a significant economic challenge as the country was spending more than it was saving.

title: Minimal Deaths Among Adolescents
description: In 2023, Dominica reported only one death among individuals aged 10-14 years, showcasing its effective healthcare and safety measures for young adolescents.

title: High Merchandise Import Residuals
description: In 2023, Dominica's merchandise imports by the reporting economy accounted for 3.51% of total merchandise imports, indicating a reliance on imported goods.

title: Minimal Public and Publicly Guaranteed Debt
description: In 2015, Dominica had one of the lowest levels of public and publicly guaranteed debt, with a value of $31,000, reflecting prudent fiscal management.
